text: Eugenia Szarlota Pawel-Kroll (1947 â€“ 7 September 2018) was a Polish comic book artist. She was known as the creator of the popular series about Kleks. She was born in Warsaw. Pawel died of colorectal cancer on 7 September 2018 in Warsaw at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Poland Category:Polish artists Category:People from Warsaw
